main.name: Cliff Horvick
main.description: I am a recent graduate of the UPenn Full Stack Web Development bootcamp
main.bio: Building experience in many technologies. Including but not limited to: Html, Css, Javascript, Nodejs, Express, Sql, MongoDb, React, Jquery
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.school: Upenn Full Stack Web Developer Bootcamp - Part Time 6 Months
education.description: We learned client side first. All aspects of web page development and integration of javascript. Next we dove into the server side of things with Nodejs and learned proper separation of client side vs. server side for security. I learned Sql and Nosql databases and how to make them communicate with my server side. We learned to make our own api's after we learned to call other public api's. Finally we learned templating engines first Handlebars then React.  We also covered the MVC framework and PWA's and various other ways of designing features on web applications for offline/online use and storage.

work.title: Branch Manager
work.description: Supervised daily lending and collection activity of staff. Approved loans and offered insurance products to customers. Serviced customers needs.  Developed and brought new business partners onboard. Maintained office standards of compliance and profitability.  Hired and trained new staff as necessary. Maintained all required state and other licenses.
